'''''Walking on Water and Striding Through Clouds''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Solitary Suanni]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].
